text: Chryseofusus riscus is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Fasciolariidae, the spindle snails, the tulip snails and their allies. ==Description== The length of the shell attains 19.1 mm. ==Distribution== This marine species occurs off New Caledonia. ==References== * Hadorn R. & Fraussen K. (2003) The deep-water Indo-Pacific radiation of Fusinus (Chryseofusus subgen. nov.) (Gastropoda: Fasciolariidae). Iberus 21(1): 207-240 ==External links== * Category:Fasciolariidae Category:Gastropods described in 2003
title: Chryseofusus riscus
